info.title: Class Documentation Editor
info.description: Handles the documentation process of the classes. Used to display the documentor tool and as a bridge between user and documentor classes

prop.name: linkedEditor
prop.description: The editor with the code that needs to be documented

method.name: __construct
method.description: Creates and initializes a classDocumentor object.

parameter.name: $editor
parameter.description: The associated editor which contents need to be documented.

parameter.name: $manual
parameter.description: The existing manual for the given code.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The name of the documentation to be stored when the code will be submitted.

method.name: getTemplates
method.description: Fetches the templates to be used by the documentation editor.
method.returndescription: A hidden pool with the templates.

method.name: getInfoTemplate
method.description: Creates a template for the class info

method.name: getConstantTemplate
method.description: Creates a template for the constants

method.name: getPropertyTemplate
method.description: Creates a template for the properties

method.name: getMethodTemplate
method.description: Creates a template for the methods
